snippet.title: Pokémon: Towering Legends Gameplay
snippet.description:
This was an old Pokémon flash game where a player would connect any color crystals with the same color and create a tower fusion. The more crystals were stacked at one time, the more points a player would get. I've never played this game before, but I do know it was once on Cartoon Network's old website a long time ago. Who remembers this one?

Platform:
BlueMaxima's Flashpoint
